Plots
======

To import plots module use:

.. code:: python

	from pyLPM import plots

.. currentmodule:: plots

Histogram
----------

.. autofunction:: histogram

Scatterplot
-------------

.. autofunction:: scatter2d

QQ plot
---------

.. autofunction:: qqplot

Locmap
--------

.. autofunction:: locmap

Pixel plot
-----------

.. autofunction:: pixelplot

Swath plots
------------

.. autofunction:: swath_plots
